wordGroup: frequently asked questions 常见问答（等于FAQ）

sentences.en: He frequently donates large sums to charity.
sentences.cn: 他经常向慈善机构大笔捐款。

sentences.en: We frequently shy away from making decisions.
sentences.cn: 我们常常因为害怕而避免做决定。

sentences.en: His refrigerator frequently looked half empty.
sentences.cn: 他的冰箱经常看上去有点儿空。
